title: The Crispy Revolution: New Mycoprotein Range
excerpt: Introducing planted.crispy — our crunchiest lineup yet. Nuggets, burgers, and schnitzels that make a satisfying crunch with every bite.
content: We've been working on something special. Our new Crispy range combines our signature pea protein base with innovative mycoprotein technology for a texture that's impossibly crispy on the outside, tender on the inside. The range includes Crispy Nuggets, Crispy Burger, and Crispy Schnitzel — each one designed to satisfy the craving for that perfect golden crunch.
author: Planted Team
